summary: A NIF file, source Blender file and wav file to use to include an animated Dwemer elevator into your own mod.
descriptionHtml:
This file contains resources for adding a fully animated Dwemer elevator into your own mod.

The files included in the archive are;

dwe_elevator_mesh.nif
dwe_elevator.blend
dwe_elevator_sound.wav
Sound Descriptor Info.rtf

This is *not* a 'plug 'n play' resource, so some familiarity with nif files, activators, preparing nifs from Blender, and Papyrus scripting is recommended. The elevator nif should be used in an activator, and can be lowered using the Papyrus command

PlayGamebryoAnimation ("ElevatorDown", True)

and raised using

PlayGamebryoAnimation ("ElevatorUp", True)

Default position is raised.
author: Andy
